Algorithm

Class ShortestPathAlgo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithm.ShortestPathAlgo

  • public class ShortestPathAlgo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages our algorithms that know how to find the best way for my Packman There are several different methods depending on the quantity of packmans and the speed. Example Algo Details: https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Algorithme_glouton
